scripts.copy-service-account: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); let src = 'legalklarity-firebase-adminsdk-fbsvc-554b402110.json'; const dest = 'dist/db/serviceAccountKey.json'; const destDir = path.dirname(dest); if (!fs.existsSync(src)) { console.log('Service account key file not found in root, checking src directory'); src = 'src/db/serviceAccountKey.json'; if (!fs.existsSync(src)) { console.log('Service account key file not found in src either, skipping copy'); } else { if (!fs.existsSync(destDir)) { fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); } fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('Service account key file copied to dist directory'); } } else { if (!fs.existsSync(destDir)) { fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); } fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('Service account key file copied to dist directory'); }" || echo "Failed to copy service account key file"
